title: Autopatcher WindowsXP March 2008
description:
This is a zip file containing the current release of Autopatcher with all extras (including DotNet and DirectX) for Windows XP only.  It is NOT compatible with other previous releases and is a standalone program.

Extract the zip file to the location of your choice and it will create a directory called Autopatcher_XP.  Browse to this directory and run \"autopatcher.exe\" to begin the patch selection process.

Autopatcher is developed by Antonis Kaladis and Jason Kelley and the latest Autopatcher Updater can be obtained on the Autopatcher forums.  Current version is 1.0.4, which fixes the freezing bug that has troubled previous releases.  Visit www.autopatcher.com for more info.

----------

DISCLAIMER:  THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL OR SUPPORTED RELEASE.  THIS ZIP CONTAINS ONLY OFFICIAL MICROSOFT REDIST SOURCES ALONG WITH THE AUTOPATCHER RUNTIME.  ALL MICROSOFT FILES WERE DOWNLOADED USING THE BETA AUTOPATCHER UPDATER.
